title: Student visas and F-1/J-1 status documents
dataVerified: Full name, DOB, nationality, school/program, SEVIS number, study authorization period
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Student status (active/completed/terminated). Link to SEVIS/immigration authority system (schools and enforcement, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake student visas. Domain binding verifies SEVIS/DHS. School enrollment verification. Work authorization (CPT/OPT). Prevents student visa fraud. F-1/J-1 compliance verification. Uses SHA-512 (government ID privacy).
